revised_title: Improving the Accuracy of Vibration Rate Determination in Tuning Forks
tldr: The authors describe an improved method for determining the rate of vibration of tuning forks using a rotating graduated drum and an electric clock. They detail the development of a pendulum-driven apparatus and discuss various challenges and solutions encountered during the process. This research contributes to the understanding of tuning fork vibrations and their potential applications in timekeeping and acoustics.
